title: open.monitor
description: Real-time monitoring system for SA-MP/open.mp servers. Provides live statistics and detailed analytics for server administrators. Built with TypeScript focusing on performance and user experience.

title: LongWayDrivers (LWD Team)
description: A comprehensive open.mp gamemode focused on cargo transport simulation. It includes dynamic delivery missions, an economic system, player progression, and immersive gameplay mechanics.

title: PAWN Painter
description: A Visual Studio Code extension specifically designed for SA-MP and open.mp programmers, revolutionising colour handling in PAWN code. It offers real-time colour visualisation, format conversion, and intuitive tools for editing RGB, HEX, and embedded colours, significantly increasing productivity.

title: tapi
description: Advanced command-line tool for managing open.mp/SA-MP projects. Simplifies package management, compilation, and PAWN project structuring. Developed in TypeScript to provide a modern and efficient development experience.

title: GameText+
description: An advanced library compatible with SA-MP and open.mp that expands and enhances the native GameText functionality. It offers improvements in text styling, animation options, and advanced formatting, allowing programmers to create more immersive interface elements.

title: open.mp - Wiki Translation
description: Active contribution to the internationalisation of open.mp documentation by translating wiki content into Portuguese. This work makes essential development resources accessible to non-English-speaking programmers, helping to expand and diversify the global open.mp community.

title: Condom√≠nio+
description: Condominium management application aimed at automating finances, maintenance, and communication between administrators and residents. Currently under active development with an emphasis on collaborative workflows and modern integrations.
